house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1975 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include patio, fireplace, air conditioning, skylights.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Anasazi Realty RE/MAX Anasazi Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen,Great Room, Library, Skylights
